channel.title: Week I on Xtern Bootcamp 2018
channel.description: Recent content in Week I on Xtern Bootcamp 2018

item.title: Day 1: Introduction
item.description: Monday, June 25, 2018 Lecture Videos Morning: Playlist | Day 1, part 1 Afternoon: Playlist | Day 1, part 1 Topics History of JavaScript and the Web Getting the most out of a coding bootcamp Mozilla Developer Network (MDN) - An excellent documentation and learning resource for all your HTML/CSS/JS needs Function Hoisting (MDN) Starting a project with git Anatomy of an HTML element (tags, attributes, text content) Basic CSS selector syntax Element name (div, h1, p, etc.

item.title: Day 2: Git and The DOM
item.description: Tuesday, June 26, 2018 Lecture Videos Morning: Playlist | Day 2, part 1 Afternoon: Playlist | Day 2, part 1 Topics Git Git Guide Git Basics Understanding Git (part 1): Explain It Like I’m Five DOM Basic DOM manipulation document.querySelector/document.querySelectorAll - MDN Docs .textContent - MDN Docs .innerHTML - MDN Docs Developer console console.log debugger - W3Schools docs Basic event handling Events in JavaScript - blog post with more detail than we discussed in class .

item.title: Day 3: DOM, Arrays and Objects
item.description: Wednesday, June 27, 2018 Lecture Videos Morning: Playlist | Day 3, part 1 Afternoon: Playlist | Day 3, part 1 Topics Creating and appending DOM Elements Flexbox and CSS Arrays and Objects ES2015+ (ES6) - Babel docs this Flexbox A Complete Guide to Flexbox Flexbox.io Flex-grow CSS CSS Tricks: A great place to search for tips and tricks in css Examples DOM If we start with the following markup: <div id="my-div"></div> We can add additional markup to it programmatically using JavaScript.

item.title: Day 4: Vanilla JS, localStorage, and Deployment
item.description: Thursday, June 28, 2018 Lecture Videos Morning: Playlist | Day 4, part 1 Afternoon: Playlist | Day 4, part 1 Topics this .indexOf( ), .splice( ), .filter( ), .closest( ) Polyfills Definition from MDN What is a Polyfill? CSS: Font Awesome, transform, transition localStorage Using localStorage JSON.stringify Using JSON.stringify API reference, including optional arguments for whitelisting properties and transforming the data as it’s stringified JSON.
